title: Profit maximizing when price and MC both equal $25

content.question: Suppose that a firm is producing the profit-maximizing output under conditions of diminishing returns. Its output price is $25, and its marginal cost of production at its current output level is $25. Based on thisÂ information, it can be concluded that this firm must
